pandoc 
  to: revealjs
  output-file: index.html
  standalone: true
  self-contained: true
  wrap: none
  default-image-extension: png
  html-math-method:
    method: mathjax
    url: >-
      https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.9/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS_HTML-full
  slide-level: 2
  incremental: true
  
metadata
  link-citations: true
  width: 1050
  height: 700
  margin: 0.1
  center: false
  navigationMode: linear
  controlsLayout: edges
  controlsTutorial: false
  hash: true
  history: true
  hashOneBasedIndex: false
  fragmentInURL: false
  transition: none
  backgroundTransition: none
  pdfSeparateFragments: false
  lang: en
  auto-stretch: true
  title: Núcleo de Innovación Social
  subtitle: Laboratorio de análisis social interdisciplinario basado en evidencia
  title-slide-attributes:
    center-title-slide: false
    data-background-image: images/presentation-cover.png
    data-background-size: cover
    data-background-opacity: '1'
    data-title-alignment: left
  footer: https://nucleodeinnovacion.netlify.app/
  slideNumber: c/t
  logo: images/logoNIS.png
  editor: visual
  theme: simple
  chalkboard: false
  notes: false
